select gi.gl_no, gi.gl_title, gi.gl_content, gi.gl_writer, gi.gl_createdat, ba.board_type, ba.file_num, ba.file_name, ba.saved_file_name, ba.file_size from gallery_info gi left outer join board_attach ba on gi.gl_no = ba.board_id and ba.file_num = (select min(b.file_num) from board_attach b where b.board_id = gi.gl_no)
order by gi.gl_no desc limit #{limit} - #{offset} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: insert into gallery_info( gl_no, gl_title, gl_content, gl_writer, gl_createdat ) values( nextval('seq_gl_no'), #{gl_title}, #{gl_content}, #{gl_writer}, current_date )

insert into board_attach( board_type, board_id, file_name, saved_file_name, file_size ) values
( 'Gallery', #{it.user_id}, #{it.file_name}, #{it.saved_file_name}, #{it.file_size} )
